name: RibAI
description:
Up/Down arrows || 8/2 || W/S || Mousewheel-Up/Down = movement up/down

Enter||Space||Escape||Left Mouse Button = accept

>------------------------------------------------------------------<

You are a fish, Robo-Fish. And you can only swim forward.

Descent into deep underwater caverns and battle with unimaginable oceaninc beasts.

How long can you survive their attacks?
